Someone works with Dagger 2?
I have a doubt
When you use Dagger, do you inject all your dependencies or do you ignore some common dependencies like a simple ArrayList?
<@U2B3MLARY> when I use dagger, I typically only inject things related to networking, database and other similar objects that I don’t want to have to keep creating by hand over and over again.

<@U2B3MLARY> Don’t inject everything. That would be wrong. Only inject things that the implementation details could be swapped for certain purpose (i.e: for testing, for having different behaviours between different product flavours, etc), single instances that should be accessible for a lot different components.
